title: Need Help Improving GPA After Low Scores in First 2 Sems
content:
I‚Äôve had a rough start with a GPA of 6.54 in my first two semesters. I‚Äôve improved since then, getting 8.5 in 3rd sem and 8.9 in 4th sem. But even if I keep doing well, my overall GPA won‚Äôt reach 8.5.

Is there anything I can do to make up for this ‚Äî like projects, internships, or certifications? I want to know if I still have a shot at good placements

comments.body: Fuck everything and try getting 10 gpa every sem, see ur max gpa, company first shortlists based on gpa only, after that it sees evrything else
Bro can you tell your mistakes so we can avoid in first sem üôèüèª
build a good resume/profile with projects you can explain, having 8+ GPA also can give you a lot of companies.

Focus on not getting any grade below a C from now one. 

Also focus on extracurriculars. 

Keep in mind for placement the min gpa required is 6.68
This is very broad, plz tell in detail
